snippet: Israel has reached a compensation agreement with the family of Ben Zygier, an Australian-Israeli who was jailed in Israel and who died after hanging himself in his cell in 2010.
abstract: Israel reaches compensation agreement with family of Ben Zygier, Australian-Israeli who was jailed in Israel after apparently getting caught in a web of espionage and who died after hanging himself in his cell in December 2010.
lead_paragraph: Israel has reached a compensation agreement with the family of Ben Zygier, an Australian-Israeli who was jailed in Israel and who died after hanging himself in his cell in 2010.

headline.main: Israel: To Avoid Trial, State Pays Family of Prisoner X
headline.print_headline: Israel: To Avoid Trial, State Pays Family of Prisoner X
